metadata.description:
"The autobiography of the Christmas legend!

The true story of Santa's life, told in his own words, from his childhood to his first Christmas Eve flight.

The ultimate Christmas book is designed for families to read aloud, and will capture the imaginations of young and old with its dream-like artwork.

Illustrated by Eisner-winner and Emmy-nominated artist Bill Sienkiewicz (X-Men, Fantastic Four), as told to Jared Green."
metadata.name: Santa: My Life and Times
